DOC.HEAD: Drunk Throws Grenade On Dance Floor, Five Killed
DOC.TEXT: A drunken former soldier threw a grenade on a dance floor at a holiday celebration, killing himself and four other people and wounding 45, the Red Cross said Tuesday. The man, identified as Julio Retana, had been denied entry to the Christmas Eve party in Santa Ana, 40 miles northeast of San Salvador, because of his drunken condition, said a Red Cross volunteer. The volunteer spoke to The Associated Press by telephone on condition of anonymity.
